nodes.value: me podrías dar una actualización sobre
Could you give me an update on
This is a polite way to ask for the current status of a project or task.
Could you give me an update on the progress of the new website?
Me podrías dar una actualización sobre el progreso de la implementación de la interfaz de usuario?
Could you give me an update on the progress of the user interface implementation?
alguien tiene tiempo para ayudar con
Does anyone have time to help with
This is a way to politely ask for assistance from your team, acknowledging that they may be busy.
Does anyone have time to help with the code review for the new feature?
Alguien tiene tiempo para ayudar con la revisión del código de los componentes?
Does anyone have time to help with the code review of the components?
